feed.title: fastpages
feed.subtitle: An easy to use blogging platform with support for Jupyter Notebooks.

entry.title: Javascripttesting
Class running Fibonacci
entry.summary: The Fibonacci algorithm can be coded many ways. This example shows Fibonacci implemented with the Streams interface. The student has challenge to use Inheritance and Polymorphism to produce multiple algorithms, but minimize code changed in original Class.

entry.title: FRQ 1 Practice
entry.summary: Practicing the first FRQ for the AP CSA Exam

entry.title: Iteration with 2D Array
entry.summary: Focus is on iteration. This example uses 2D array with simple ASCII art. The idea of this example was to incorporate ASCII art with a nursery rhyme.
